name: AE Roundy POP
description:
A highly addictive game ‘AE Roundy POP’ is free at your phone now!

AE Roundy POP is a very casual game with elements of unique mechanic and very easy-to-learn concept. Various bonuses levels, colorful graphics and smooth gameplay make it addictive, strategic and challenging fun for everyone, it’s a great way to kill time!

The task of the game is to clear the board by popping groups of 2 or more blocks of the same color, there is no time limit, the goal of the game is to clear more blocks in a single remove, reach the target points and proceed to next stage. The more blocks you pop, the more scores you will get.

Game includes:
(1) 7 different color of Block
(2) 5 varieties of Special Effects for certain removing
(3) Very casual background music
(4) Endless game mode.
(5) Undo previous clear or buy coins if you want

If you enjoy pop star, or other elimination, puzzle kids games, you shouldn’t miss this game!

Come on! You will love the challenging and endless removing in game! Go and experience the easy-to-learn and difficult-to-stop game
